topics.body:
In a more serious post here's some stuff and it's a post on Ai:


I was talking to someone and basically here's the run down on Ai development and why we don't have human level intelligence yet:
We don't have creative Ai yet so stop bugging people.

What I mean by this is that in order for there to be human level intelligence in Ai the blue brain project has to finish and several other projects have to finish first.  Right now we're in the process of understanding the human brain and reverse engineering it through inorganic means.

To summarize it:
We have to develop neurochips that can simulate a hundred billion brain cells first and that's going to take another fifteen years.

The blue brain project has to finish and that's going to take ten years.

Then we have to make it to where Ai's programming is based off neural pathways; essentially write a programming language for Ai.  Right now we simply copy the neural pathways, we don't actually have a programming language for it.

We then have to program the core programming for them so that they can actually function and have a base consciousness to grow off of; basically program them with the ability to speak and give them a basic personality to base off of.




There's still a ton of steps to do; it's going to take 10 years until we actually have the programming language needed, it's going to be 15 years until we have computers powerful enough, it's going to be at least 15 to 20 years until we have the base Ai for Ai to grow off of to come about.



Tl:dr; Sapient Ai are going to at first be like Data from Star Trek: The Next Generation at first they're going to have little to no personality and grow into it.

Tl:dr; of Tl:dr;
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/09/DataTNG.jpg!
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53afc8d16368720d91ef0000#post_53afc8d16368720d91ef0000
[bq="Randomosaur"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53afc87d6368720e24790000#post_53afc87d6368720e24790000
What the fuck?

*Satan's hand suddenly grabs me and pulls me into Hell*[/bq]
"Hey Randomosaur; have I shown you my apartment yet?"
